Can make Focus Power Test immediately after killing another in combat as a Free Action. If Successful gain one of the following bonuses until the end of Psyker's next turn:
 +10 to next Test Rolled; Unnatural Characteristic(2)(Any Characteristic); or Jaded, Nerves of Steel, and Resistance(Fear) Talents; (Only If using Sacrifice Talent) +5xPsy Rating to all rolls of next Extended Test, lasts 24 Hours
Using this power sacrifices the character's reaction for the round.
If failing Focus Power Test and causing Psychic Phenomena, add +5 per Degree of Failiure to Psychic Phenomena Roll.
